list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the disguising of military personnel, equipment, and installations by painting or covering them to make them blend in with their surroundings.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: on the trenches were pieces of turf which served for camouflage
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: trên các chiến hào là những mảnh cỏ được phục vụ để ngụy trang

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: hide or disguise the presence of (a person, animal, or object) by means of camouflage.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the war area had to be camouflaged with mud
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Khu vực chiến tranh phải được ngụy trang với bùn
